rooms.name: Guest Bedroom

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Fully functional bathroom adjacent to guest bedroom, ensuring privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Storage Room/Utility Closet
rooms.description: Dedicated storage for extra utilities, maintaining clutter-free spaces.

rooms.name: Private Gymnasium

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Room for washing machine, dryer and other appliances. Designed to support smooth flow of energy.
